about_the_game:
Boötes Easter Egg


Boötes includes an easter egg along with its gameplay. It is important to note that completing this Easter Egg will reward the player with an achievement and other rewards in game throughout the progression. It will take a lot of skill to complete this Easter Egg and only the best will figure it out. Good Luck and Happy Hunting!

Boötes Storyline


In the year 2872, David, who is an astrologist, finds himself in the vast nothingless, known as The Boötes Void. He leaves his family behind to research the mysterious crystals near the planet Loki II, which is located in the heart of The Boötes Void. These crystals seem to provide power to those who collect them. Most importantly, they believe this power could help ships in outer space move even faster. Later the crew of the space station, who are comprised of both researchers and specially trained astronauts, venture out to the dark side of the planet where most of the crystals are located. Most of the crew freeze over and the ones who remain came back to name the location the Cold Dark. After months go by, the crew ends up dying from numerous hazards and going back to the Cold Dark. David is now by himself. He continues to survive on his own for quite sometime but later he decides to put on the space suit and travel to the Cold Dark himself.

Boötes Gameplay


Your goal is to collect a total of 3 crystals in each location around the planet while jumping on astroids. It is important to note that each level the astroids will rotate faster and faster, making it harder for you, the player, to balance. After you collect all 3 crystals in the location you will be able to travel to another location. Each crystal you collect will give you new abilities/upgrades. For example, you may collect a crystal that gives you super jump. This allows the player to jump higher in space for a short period of time. Once you find this crystal, every location after will provide you with an upgrade to that ability. You can also unlock suits for beating levels, as well as, finding secret astronaut suits in the locations. By collecting these hidden suits on each level, you will be able to unlock master class versions of the other suits in the game. Suits in general, will give the player passive perks. Players can also add a perk to the suit if they collect them from the dream world. The dream world may look like a mini game, but it is crucial for many parts of the game. It can be accessed in your base and all the player must do is sleep. Once you are dreaming, you will be able to play a unique spin on the jumping formula. If you get far enough, you can collect green cubes that will give you access to new perks for your suits. Your main objective is to visit the Cold Dark and collect the final crystals to escape. However, there may be other secrets hidden away.

Boötes One-Shot Mode


This mode is made for those who are looking for the ultimate challenge. This mode is just the base game, but if you fall, it is game over. Although, if you complete a level in One-Shot, you will earn permanant upgrades for your perks.

Boötes Abilities


  • Super Jump - Allows player to jump much higher for a short duration.

  • Super Light - Allows player to shine a bright light from their helmet for a short duration.

  • Air Control - Allows player more control while mid-air.

name: Boötes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) +
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 5700, GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game can run at 4k 60fps on the high setting on RTX 2080ti.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) +
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 6700 XT, Geforce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game can run at 4k 60fps on the high setting on RTX 2080ti.

short_description: Boötes is a Space Sim where you get to jump on astroids. Collect Crystals, Unlock New Abilities, Find Secrets to Unlock New Suits, and Much More. You are all alone in The Boötes Void where you find mysterious crystals that can help fuel your space shuttle so you can visit the Cold Dark.
